title: Camera following cause champion to walk with a Choppy lag.
body: Playing a few ARAM games today and noticed if i use the camera to follow my Champ they will move with a  kinda choppy like skippy motion. If i unfollow they walk almost normal. Any ideas?

replies.body: Does this happen if you change your window mode to another type such as Full Screen or Borderless? You can find these settings under your **VIDEO** options in-game.
I have tried all options and even both versions of the client with no avail.
When this issue happens, do you notice **any** chance in your FPS at all?

I'm also having this issue. Changing the window mode doesn't affect it, but disabling vertical sync does (but of course that introduces screen tearing). No performance issues whatsoever, and it only affects the player champion when the camera is locked. The enemy and ally champions, minions, jungle creatures, map, turrets, etc. all remain smooth. 

I'd noticed it on the PBE while testing Elementalist Lux, but I had assumed it was an issue with the skin.

Hmm.. I've heard of similar issues in the past. Can you hop into your in-game settings and ensure *Movement Prediction* is disabled under your **Game** settings? Below is a screenshot showing where this option is:

https://imgur.com/a/OSXlP

I hope this worked!
I'm having the same problems he is, but I have movement prediction off and it's still happening

Thanks for all of the tips!

Here's what ended up working for me: 

I used the NVIDIA control panel (my graphics card is a Hybrid 980Ti, so that's the software it uses) to enable the "Fast" vertical sync setting for the GPU, in addition to having vertical sync on in the game.

I'm not sure why that fixes it, but it does. I can add screenshots if that doesn't quite make sense.
would you mind walking me through the steps on how to do that because i am also having this problem and its really annoying
I have the same problem and it doesn't change if I go to borderless or windowed

Same exact problem here.

I thought it was my computer lagging.

Glad to know someone else has the same issue.

Update: Have tried every variation of options i can choose. From re adjusting every quality to running in admin. No options seem to alleviate the issue the slightest. If anyone finds an answer please share! Thanks.
